extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the Virus Definitions Version for McAfee Virex. This attribute template applies to McAfee Virex (v7.0).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #This script has been verified to work on McAfee Virex (v7.0). #Check to see if McAfee Virex is installed if [ -f "/usr/local/vscanx/uvscan" ]; then result=`/usr/local/vscanx/uvscan --version | grep "Virus data" | awk '{print $4}' | cut -c 2-` echo "<result>$result</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
